network_scanner.networkit_based.networkit_util.get_average_shortest_path_appro(connected_net, sample_num)[source]¶

estimate average shortest path.

subgraph bug! why does subgraph store unnecessary information of origin graph? BFS can detect this bug.

Parameters:
  • connected_net – connected graph
  • sample_num – sample size. the larger the number is, the slower the program is.
Returns:

approximately average shortest path
